light-duty.description: Compact and efficient trucks for urban and light commercial applications

x9.description: X9 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: X9 Tow Truck
models.description: Professional heavy-duty towing solution with advanced recovery capabilities. Features powerful winch system, stabilizing outriggers, and robust chassis design for safe vehicle recovery operations.

models.name: X9 Aerial Work Platform Truck
models.description: Versatile aerial work platform for construction and maintenance tasks. Provides safe access to elevated work areas with stable platform and advanced safety features.

models.name: X9 4X4 Dump Truck
models.description: Professional 4x4 dump truck from the X9 series. Designed for reliability, efficiency, and superior performance in demanding commercial applications. Features advanced engineering and robust construction for long-lasting service.

models.name: X9 Dump Truck
models.description: Designed for construction material transport with 3–4.5 tons payload. Features 4.1L diesel engine (156 hp), hydraulic tipping system, and durable steel box. Compact 4×2 chassis allows easy maneuvering at construction sites and urban areas.

models.name: X9 Van Truck
models.description: Ideal for transporting goods and packages with cargo volume 12–20 m³. 3.8L diesel engine (130–150 hp) ensures efficient performance, while the 4×2 chassis provides urban delivery flexibility and low operating costs.

models.name: X9 Fuel Tanker Truck
models.description: Designed for safe and efficient fuel transport in urban and regional routes. Features a 3,000–6,000L durable fuel tank, 4.1L turbo diesel engine (120–160 hp) for reliable performance, and a compact 4×2 chassis that ensures easy maneuvering. Equipped with reinforced safety valves and optimized weight distribution for smooth handling under full load. Ideal for fuel delivery to stations, industrial plants, and construction sites.

models.name: X9 Garbage Truck
models.description: Ideal for municipal solid waste collection, featuring a 6–8 m³ compaction body, reliable 4×2 drive, and 4.0L diesel engine (140 hp). Efficient, low-maintenance, and maneuverable for city streets and urban waste routes.

models.name: X9 Refrigerated Truck
models.description: Engineered for transporting perishable goods safely, with -5°C to -18°C temperature control and insulated 10–18 m³ box. Powered by 4.2L diesel engine (150–170 hp) with reliable 4×2 drive, ensuring timely delivery with low energy consumption.

e9.description: E9 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: E9 Refrigerated Truck
models.description: Maintains perishable goods at -5°C to -20°C with insulated 10–18 m³ box. Powered by 4.0–4.5L diesel engine (150–170 hp) for reliability. Ideal for food and pharmaceutical distribution with low energy consumption and high durability.

models.name: E9 Dump Truck
models.description: Reliable dump truck for urban construction and material transport. Features efficient hydraulic system and durable construction for everyday commercial use.

models.name: E9 Van Truck
models.description: Spacious cargo van for commercial delivery and logistics operations. Features large cargo area with weather protection and fuel-efficient engine.

models.name: E9 Kitchen Waste Garbage Truck
models.description: Specialized for kitchen and wet waste collection. Features 5–8 m³ sealed tank, 4.2L diesel engine (140–165 hp), 4×2 drive for urban routes. Provides hygienic, efficient, and reliable waste transport for municipal services.

x7.description: X7 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: X7 Concrete Mixer Truck
models.description: Efficient concrete mixing and delivery truck for construction projects. Features reliable mixing drum and hydraulic system for consistent concrete quality.

models.name: X7 Flatbed Truck
models.description: Flexible cargo transport solution for urban deliveries, offering 3–5 ton payload on a compact flatbed. Powered by 3.8L diesel engine (120–140 hp), it provides excellent maneuverability, low maintenance, and versatile applications in logistics and delivery services.

models.name: X7 Sprinkler Truck
models.description: Used for street cleaning and dust suppression, fitted with 3,000–6,000L water tank and spray system. Equipped with 4.0L diesel engine (140 hp), the truck ensures effective municipal water spraying with easy operation and maintenance.

models.name: X7 Truck Mounted Crane
models.description: Light-duty lifting solution with 2–4 ton crane capacity, ideal for small construction or loading tasks. Powered by 4.2L diesel engine (150 hp) with 4×2 drive, offering precise, safe, and efficient lifting.

models.name: X7 Dump Truck
models.description: Efficient for construction material transport, carrying 3–5 tons of sand, gravel, or aggregates. Equipped with 4.1L diesel engine (156 hp), hydraulic tipping system, and durable steel body. Suitable for urban and semi-urban construction projects with excellent maneuverability and durability.

i9.description: i9 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: i9 New Energy Truck
models.description: Features integrated electric drive axle with highly integrated structure for higher efficiency and extended range. Offers 430 km working range with 120 kW fast charging technology, achieving full charge in 65 minutes. Brake energy recovery reduces consumption by 15%.

medium-duty.description: Versatile trucks for commercial and industrial applications

e6.description: E6 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: E6 Dump Truck
models.description: Professional dump truck from the E6 series. Designed for reliability, efficiency, and superior performance in demanding commercial applications. Features advanced engineering and robust construction for long-lasting service.

models.name: E6 Stake Truck
models.description: Designed for agricultural and logistics applications, providing 6–10 ton payload with flexible stake body. Powered by 6.0L diesel engine (180–220 hp), with 4×2/6×2 drive options, offering durability, versatility, and ease of loading/unloading.

models.name: E6 Van Truck
models.description: Professional van truck from the E6 series. Designed for reliability, efficiency, and superior performance in demanding commercial applications. Features advanced engineering and robust construction for long-lasting service.

models.name: E6 Refrigerated Truck
models.description: Maintains goods at -5°C to -18°C in 10–24 m³ cargo volume. 6.2L diesel engine (190–230 hp) ensures reliable distribution for medium-distance logistics, food transport, and pharmaceutical delivery.

models.name: E6 Sprinkler Truck
models.description: Equipped with 6,000–12,000L water tank and spray system for urban road cleaning. Engineered for medium-duty municipal applications with robust 4×2 drive and easy maintenance.

models.name: E6 Truck Mounted Crane
models.description: Professional truck mounted crane from the E6 series. Designed for reliability, efficiency, and superior performance in demanding commercial applications. Features advanced engineering and robust construction for long-lasting service.

models.name: E6 Cement Mixer Truck
models.description: Ideal for medium-scale construction projects, carrying 4–6 m³ concrete. 6.0L diesel engine (200 hp), 6×2 drive, durable mixing drum with high efficiency, and easy control.

x6.description: X6 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: X6 Dump Truck
models.description: Heavy-duty medium truck for construction, capable of transporting 8–12 tons of material. Equipped with 6.5L diesel engine (260 hp), robust 6×4 chassis, hydraulic tipper, and durable steel box.

models.name: X6 Flatbed Truck
models.description: Medium-duty cargo transport truck, carrying 4–7 tons. 6.2L diesel engine (220–260 hp), 6×4 drive, flatbed allows flexible loading/unloading.

models.name: X6 Van Truck
models.description: 18–28 m³ cargo body, medium-duty logistics transport. Engineered with 6.2L diesel engine (230 hp) for reliability and fuel efficiency.

models.name: X6 Truck Mounted Crane
models.description: Lifting capacity 4–8 Tons for construction and loading tasks. 6.5L diesel engine (260 hp), 6×4 drive, precise crane operation, and heavy-duty chassis.

models.name: X6 Cargo Truck
models.description: General transport truck with side drop gates for logistics and medium freight. 6.2L diesel engine (230 hp), 6×4 drive, robust and versatile.

models.name: X6 AWD Cargo Truck
models.description: Professional awd cargo truck from the X6 series. Designed for reliability, efficiency, and superior performance in demanding commercial applications. Features advanced engineering and robust construction for long-lasting service.

models.name: X6 Dropside Truck
models.description: Professional dropside truck from the X6 series. Designed for reliability, efficiency, and superior performance in demanding commercial applications. Features advanced engineering and robust construction for long-lasting service.

models.name: X6 Cement Mixer Truck
models.description: 4–6 m³ mixer capacity for medium construction applications. 6.5L diesel engine (260 hp), 6×4 drive, high-efficiency rotating drum.

models.name: X6 Concrete Mixer Truck
models.description: Professional concrete mixer truck from the X6 series. Designed for reliability, efficiency, and superior performance in demanding commercial applications. Features advanced engineering and robust construction for long-lasting service.

models.name: X6 Loading Crane Recovery Truck
models.description: Multi-purpose recovery vehicle with integrated loading crane. Combines towing capability with lifting function for versatile recovery and transport operations.

models.name: X6 Sprinkler Truck
models.description: 6,000–12,000L water tank for street cleaning, 6×4 drive, 6.5L diesel engine (260 hp), reliable municipal service.

models.name: X6 Dust Suppression Truck
models.description: Equipped with water cannon and fog system reaching 30–60 m. 6.5L diesel engine (260 hp), 6×4 drive, designed for urban and highway dust control.

models.name: X6 Garbage Truck
models.description: 8–12 m³ compression bin for municipal waste. 6.5L diesel engine (260 hp), 6×4 drive, efficient compaction system.

models.name: X6 Fuel Tanker Truck
models.description: 8,000–14,000L fuel transport capacity for medium routes. Equipped with 6.5L diesel engine (260 hp), reinforced tank, and 6×4 drive.

heavy-duty.description: Robust trucks for demanding construction and industrial tasks

z3.description: Z3 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: Z3 Dump Truck
models.description: Heavy-duty dump truck with reinforced chassis and high-capacity hydraulic system. Built for demanding construction and mining operations with superior durability and performance.

e1st.description: E1st Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: E1st Tractor
models.description: Professional tractor from the E1st series. Designed for reliability, efficiency, and superior performance in demanding commercial applications. Features advanced engineering and robust construction for long-lasting service.

e3.description: E3 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: E3 Muck Truck
models.description: Designed for large-scale mining, construction, and earthmoving operations. Carries 12–30 m³ of muck with reinforced steel body. 8.0L diesel engine (320–360 hp) provides high torque for off-road and heavy-load performance. Heavy-duty 6×4 chassis ensures stability and reliability in tough terrains.

models.name: E3 Tractor Truck
models.description: Ensures driving safety with dual warning system. Features efficient power chain and excellent chassis configuration. Comfortable berth design with 850mm width and 800mm spacing between berths.

models.name: E3 Van Truck
models.description: Features maintenance-free high-efficiency drive axle and low rolling resistance tires for reduced fuel consumption. High-strength lightweight suspension and cab width of 2240mm provide spacious comfort.

models.name: E3 Dump Truck
models.description: Heavy-duty dump truck for large construction projects, carrying 10–20 tons of aggregates. Equipped with 8.0L diesel engine (320–360 hp) and hydraulic tipping system. Robust 6×4 chassis ensures stability and reliability under heavy loads.

models.name: E3 Cement Mixer Truck
models.description: Heavy-duty mixer carrying 6–10 m³ concrete for large construction sites. 8.0L diesel engine (330 hp), durable 6×4 chassis, high-efficiency drum rotation ensures smooth and consistent mixing.

models.name: E3 Compactor Garbage Truck
models.description: Designed for large municipal waste collection. 12–20 m³ compression body efficiently compacts waste, 8.0L diesel engine (320–360 hp), 6×4 drive ensures reliable operation in urban and industrial environments.

models.name: E3 Stake Truck
models.description: Heavy-duty cargo transport truck with 12–18 ton payload. 8.0L diesel engine (330 hp), durable 6×4 chassis, ideal for construction materials, agricultural products, and industrial freight. Features robust stake body design for flexible loading configurations and enhanced cargo security.

models.name: E3 Sewage Suction Truck
models.description: Municipal sewage and waste water management vehicle. Powerful vacuum system with sealed tank for hygienic waste water collection and transport.

9series.description: 9 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: 9 Series Sweeper
models.description: Heavy-duty street sweeper for highway and industrial cleaning. Advanced sweeping technology with large capacity bins for extensive cleaning operations.

models.name: 9 Series Garbage Truck
models.description: Heavy-duty waste collection vehicle with large compaction capacity. Designed for industrial and large municipal waste management with robust construction.

models.name: 9 Series Tow Truck
models.description: Heavy-duty recovery vehicle for commercial and industrial towing. High-capacity winch system with advanced recovery equipment for heavy vehicle recovery operations.

models.name: 9 Series Truck Mounted Crane
models.description: Heavy-duty mobile crane for major lifting operations. High-capacity crane with extended reach and precise control for construction and industrial applications.

models.name: 9 Series Cement Mixer Truck
models.description: Heavy-duty cement mixer for large construction projects. High-capacity mixing drum with powerful hydraulic system ensures consistent concrete quality for major construction sites.

6series.description: 6 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: 6 Series Sweeper
models.description: Street cleaning vehicle with advanced sweeping system and dust suppression. Efficient for municipal road maintenance with environmental-friendly operation.

models.name: 6 Series Garbage Truck
models.description: Municipal waste collection vehicle with efficient compaction system. Designed for urban waste management with reliable hydraulic operation and easy maintenance.

models.name: 6 Series Truck Mounted Crane
models.description: Mobile crane solution for medium lifting operations. Combines transportation and lifting capabilities with precise hydraulic control and stable operation.

models.name: 6 Series Cement Mixer Truck
models.description: Medium-capacity cement mixer with robust chassis and efficient mixing drum. Designed for consistent concrete delivery in medium-scale construction projects.

3series.description: 3 Series trucks for various commercial applications

models.name: 3 Series Cement Mixer Truck
models.description: Compact cement mixer for small to medium construction projects. Efficient mixing system with reliable hydraulic operation for consistent concrete quality in urban construction environments.
